name.japanese: パンクハザード - 氷の区域

description: The frozen half of Punk Hazard, covered in ice and snow as a result of the battle between Aokiji and Akainu. This harsh, frigid environment is home to various frozen structures and dangers.

keyEvents.title: Brook vs. Mysterious Torso Samurai
keyEvents.description: Brook encounters and battles Kin'emon's severed torso in this frozen wasteland.
keyEvents.significance: Location of the comedic yet mysterious fight between Brook and the headless swordsman.

statusHistory.reason: Frozen environment created by Aokiji's ice powers during his battle with Akainu

description: A lake on Punk Hazard where Luffy's group encounters Brownbeard and his centaur unit. The lake serves as a transition point between different areas of the island.

keyEvents.title: Brownbeard's Centaur Unit Attacks
keyEvents.description: Brownbeard and his centaurs attack Luffy, Zoro, Usopp, and Robin at the lake.
keyEvents.significance: Site of the first direct confrontation between the Straw Hats and the island's defenders.

name.japanese: パンクハザード研究所

description: Vegapunk's former research laboratory on Punk Hazard, now occupied by Caesar Clown for his experiments. The facility houses kidnapped children and various scientific equipment for dangerous experiments.

keyEvents.title: Chopper Protects Children
keyEvents.description: Chopper fights off hazmat soldiers attempting to recapture the children inside the laboratory.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the ongoing conflict to protect the children from Caesar's experiments.

keyEvents.title: Sheep-Like Soldiers Revealed
keyEvents.description: Sanji and Franky discover the hazmat soldiers are sheep-like creatures.
keyEvents.significance: First reveal of Caesar's hybrid animal experiments.

keyEvents.title: Surveillance of Intruders
keyEvents.description: Monitoring systems track all intruders' movements from the central control room.
keyEvents.significance: Establishes Caesar's awareness and control over the island's events.

statusHistory.reason: Currently occupied by Caesar Clown for experiments

description: A forbidden island in the New World, split into a frozen side and a burning side due to the ten-day battle between Aokiji and Akainu. Formerly Vegapunk's research facility, now used by Caesar Clown for illegal experiments. Entry to the island is strictly prohibited by the World Government.

keyEvents.title: Smoker and G-5 Marines Infiltrate
keyEvents.description: Vice Admiral Smoker leads the G-5 Marines through the ice barriers, discovering a hidden river entrance to the island.
keyEvents.significance: Marines infiltrate the forbidden island, escalating the conflict.

keyEvents.title: Law Revealed as Island's Guardian
keyEvents.description: Trafalgar Law, now a Shichibukai, is revealed to be stationed at Punk Hazard.
keyEvents.significance: Establishes Law's mysterious role on the forbidden island.

statusHistory.reason: Forbidden island being used for illegal experiments
